body:
All Versions

  • Look up a Provider: Fixed scenario when no results were returned when including a middle initial in search. All providers without a middle initial will be listed first, then providers with a middle initial
  • Activity Stream: Fixed incorrect list when clicking "Listed details" activity
  • Activity Stream: Added new Search feature
  • Rank Networks: Fixed export error with a new ranking

Network360edge Only

  • Additional Terms and Conditions throughout the application
